channel.title: hdmi on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hdmi on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Bad image quality from HDMI connected PC to Samsung LED LCD
item.description: So, we finally upgraded our old CRT TV to a newer, Full HD Samsung LCD TV (ue37c5000). Since we have a media-center PC the first thing I did was of course hook it up and test a few full hd clips to enjoy the new TV. Everything was nice and well until I switched the tv from the VGA cable I had lying around to a HDMI cable I just bought.
